chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to News English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.歡迎收聽新聞英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we'll be learning about news.這個單元,我們要來學習的是新聞英語。So first, let's listen to today's news.首先,我們來聽一下今天的新聞。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: A raging wildfire has ignited in the southwest, and as of Saturday, it continues to pose a significant threat to the area.The fire, fueled by dry plants and strong winds, has rapidly spread and is currently covering 43 acres.Local authorities, along with dedicated firefighting teams, are working diligently to stop the fire.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Evacuation orders have been issued in several communities within

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: 西南部爆發了猛烈的野火。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: A raging wildfire 意思就是強烈的大火。Ignite 動詞就是燃燒。As of 後面加上時間,這個片語表示從什麼時候開始。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Fueled by dry plants 迅速蔓延。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Cover 是一個動詞,指的是涵蓋了多少面積。Local authorities, along with dedicated firefighting teams, are working diligently to stop the fire.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Evacuation orders have been issued in several communities within the fire's path to ensure the safety of residents.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Evacuation orders have been issued in several communities within the fire's path to ensure the safety of residents.Emergency shelters have been set up for those affected by the wildfire.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: The situation remains dynamic and challenging due to the unpredictable nature of wildfires.由於野火的不可預測性,局勢仍充滿變化與挑戰。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Unpredictable 形容詞不可預測的。Firefighters are fighting intense flames and difficult terrain as they attempt to gain control.消防隊員正試圖控制火勢,同時正與猛烈的火焰與險峻的地形搏鬥。Intense 形容詞強烈的。Flame 名詞原來指的是火焰,這邊其實就是fire的意思。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Terrain 名詞地形Attempt to do something 就是試圖企圖做某事。Weather conditions, including wind patterns, are being closely monitored as they greatly influence the fire's behavior.天氣的狀況包含風向正在嚴密的監控,因為會對火災有極大的影響。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Language Focus 學習焦點

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Words and phrases 詞彙片語

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Raging 形容詞劇烈的、狂暴的。Ignite 動詞點燃燃燒。As of 介系詞自起。Pose a significant threat to 片語構成重大威脅。Fuel 動詞為添加燃料加強。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Cover 動詞蓋上覆蓋。Authority 名詞當局當權者。Alone with 介系詞隨著。Dedicated 形容詞盡心盡力的、盡職盡責的。Emergency Shelter 名詞緊急避難所。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Evaluation 名詞情況形式。Dynamic 形容詞充滿活力的、動力的。Challenging 形容詞有挑戰性、有難度的。Unpredictable 形容詞無法預測的、難以預見的。Intense 形容詞強烈的、極度的。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: Flame 名詞火焰、火蛇。Terrain 名詞地形、地帶。Attempt to 片語嘗試。Monitor 動詞監控、監測。Behaviour 名詞運轉狀態、行為舉止。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通A raging wildfire has ignited in the South West. 西南區野火肆虐
chunks.chunk_text: 最後請記得每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通。我是齊彬老師。Until then, see you next time.
